scripts.build:old: npm run clean && tsx ./build/build.ts && npm run build:types && npm run build:alias
scripts.test:push: npm run gen:exports && npm run build && yalc push
scripts.release: npm run gen:exports && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:beta: npm run gen:exports && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:next: npm run build && lerna publish --dist-tag=next --no-private --no-push --yes -m "chore(@gaman) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && lerna publish --dist-tag=beta --no-private -m "chore(@gaman) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run build && lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=test --no-private --no-push -m "chore(@gaman) publish %s release"
